name: Prison
effect: *In the town you have passed recently, you heard rumors of some people from your lands having been imprisoned by a local governor. In a dazzling display of daring, you break into the jail and free all imprisoned there. In return, some of them pledge loyalty to your cause.*
flavor_text: In the town you have passed recently, you heard rumors of some people from your lands having been imprisoned by a local governor. In a dazzling display of daring, you break into the jail and free all imprisoned there. In return, some of them pledge loyalty to your cause.
